import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCartShopping, faUser } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { useAuth } from "../../context/auth"; import toast from "react-hot-toast"; const Header = ({ id }) => { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth(); const [isDropdownOpen, setIsDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { setAuth({ ...auth, user: null, token: "", }); localStorage.removeItem("auth"); toast.success("Logout Successfully"); }; const handleOutsideClick = (event) => { if (isDropdownOpen && !event.target.closest("#dropdownNavbar")) { setIsDropdownOpen(false); } }; window.addEventListener("click", handleOutsideClick); return ( <>
CARTCRAFT
  • Home
  • Contact
    • {!auth.user ? ( <>
  • Register
  • Login
    • ) : ( <>
  • {/* Dropdown menu */}
    • Dashboard
    • Logout
    • )}
  • ({0})
); }; export default Header;
